attributes.action: GIVE PUBLIC A REFERENDUM ON IMMIGRATION CONTROL / REGULATIONS AND LAWS
attributes.additional_details:
THE GOVERNMENT MUST STOP BORDERFORCE FROM BRINGING THE IMMIGRANTS ON TO OUR SHORES AND GIVE THEM WHAT THEY NEED TO TURN THEM BACK.
THE PUBLIC HAVE HAD ENOUGH AND NEED THE GOVERNMENT TO ACT NO, NOT IN A FEW MONTHS OR YEARS. THE BRITISH DO NOT FEEL SAFE IN THEIR OWN COUNTRY
attributes.background:
THE GOVERNMENT MUST CHANGE  THE WAY THEY CONTROL IMMIGRATION AND GIVE THE RIGHT TO THE PUBLIC TO HAVE A REFERENDUM ON THE MATTER.
WE FEEL NOTHING IS BEING DONE

rejection.details: We understand you want a referendum on immigration, but we can't publish a petition until you explain what the referendum would be asking the public to decide on
